channel.title: Working armor?
channel.description:
I have all the bonuses set for the armor, but players still hit just as often on other players as they would without armor. How can I make armour make people actually hit less often?
Oh and which .java do i modify? People are saying client.java otheres player.java or playerhander etc. So which one?
Thanks for taking the time to read ;D

item.title: Working armor?
item.dc:creator: @parkview parkview
item.description:
@parkview wrote:

I have tried everything and I cant fix it.

Read full topic

item.title: Working armor?
item.dc:creator: @_Java_Maybe • Java Maybe •
item.description:
@_Java_Maybe wrote:

Make a formula in public void calculateMaxhit()

First think before you make a 2nd topic on how to help.

Read full topic
